about.postion: I am a Full Stack Software Developer.
about.description: I am an individual committed to a continuous development process, characterized by my responsibility, organization, and proactivity. My unwavering passion for learning, along with my skill in effective communication and problem-solving, drives me towards constant evolution and growth. I am actively seeking opportunities that challenge me and allow me to contribute with my adaptability and creativity, always oriented towards achieving goals and excellence.
